articles.title: Greetings to German President
articles.content:
Greetings to German President
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Saturday sent a message of greeting to Joachim Gauck, president of Germany, on the occasion of its national day.
					 Expressing belief that the relations between the two countries would develop favorably in the interests of the peoples of the two countries, the message wished the German president success in his responsible work.

articles.title: Ri Su Yong Urges Change of Armistice Agreement into Peace Treaty
articles.content:
Ri Su Yong Urges Change of Armistice Agreement into Peace Treaty 
Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong, head of a DPRK delegation, made a speech at the 70th session of the UN General Assembly on October 1.
					He went on:
					
					It is important to draw experiences from the successes and learn lessons from the failures made in the activities of the UN.
					
					The world has never been peaceful over the past 70 years. Neither has the humankind ever lived in comfort.
					
					Even in the 21st century, the UN Security Council continues to commit arbitrary acts against the DPRK in flagrant violation of justice and international law.
					
					In today's world, there exists international law that defines the use of outer space as a sovereign right of every individual country and there are more than 10 countries that launch satellites. However, the UN Security Council passed a "resolution" on prohibiting the DPRK only from launching the satellites.
					
					Nine countries in the world have already developed nuclear weapons and conducted over 2,000 nuclear tests in total. But again, the Security Council adopted "resolutions" on prohibiting nuclear test of the DPRK.
					
					Our development of outer space for peaceful purposes is a legitimate right of a sovereign state and our nuclear test is a self-defensive measure to cope with the hostile policy and nuclear threat of the United States.
					
					It is the steadfast resolve and position of the Government of the DPRK to safeguard its dignity by responding strongly to the end with all available self-defensive measures against the unjust acts of taking issue with the peaceful satellite launch.
					
					Late last August, the situation on the Korean Peninsula had once again headed to the brink of war.
					
					After going through the August incident that made Northeast Asia and the entire world hold their breath in anxiety, it has become a crucial issue today to replace the armistice agreement with a peace treaty with no further delay.
					
					The Government of the DPRK is willing to hold constructive dialogue to prevent war and conflicts on the Korean Peninsula, once the United States agrees to replace the armistice agreement with a peace treaty.
					
					If the United States makes a policy change with courage, dramatic improvement will be effected in the security environment on the Korean Peninsula and eventually lead to addressing security concerns of the United States.
					
					This is the best option we can afford and the best solution we can offer at this forum of the UN as it looks back on the past 70 years and looks forward to the road ahead.
					
					The DPRK is strongly convinced that the urgent replacement of the armistice agreement with a peace treaty is the way to ensure peace and security on the Korean Peninsula and redress the abnormal relations between the DPRK and the UN.

articles.title: Gifts to Kim Jong Un from Russian Figures
articles.content:
Gifts to Kim Jong Un from Russian Figures
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un was presented with gifts by the general manager of the Samstroi Company of Russia and the manager of the R.R. Group Co. Ltd., of Russia on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The gifts were handed over to officials concerned of the DPRK working in Russia on Sept. 23 and 25 by General Manager Fridman Vladimir Yevseyevich and Manager M. R. Nizamov.

articles.title: Foundation Day of Korea Marked
articles.content:
Foundation Day of Korea Marked
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- The Foundation Day of Korea was marked before the Mausoleum of King Tangun on Saturday.
					 Present at the event were Kim Yong Dae, chairman of the Central Committee of the Korean Social Democratic Party who doubles as chairman of the National Reconciliation Council, Kim Wan Su, director of the Secretariat of the Central Committee of the Democratic Front for the Reunification of Korea who doubles as chairman of the North Side's Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration, Choe Jin Su, presidium member of the C.C., the Democratic Front for the Reunification of Korea who doubles as chairman of the North Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification, Ri Kil Song, presidium member of the C.C., the Democratic Front for the Reunification of Korea, officials of the Council for the Reunification of Tangun's Nation, officials concerned, working people in the city and overseas compatriots.
					
					 A memorial service for Tangun took place.
					
					 Yun Jong Ho, vice-chairman of the Council for the Reunification of Tangun's Nation, said in a report that President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il found out and glorified the ancestral father of the nation and the history of the nation spanning five thousand years. 
					
					 He praised Marshal Kim Jong Un for upholding and preserving the immortal feats of the peerlessly great men and further glorifying the history and tradition of the nation.
					
					 He noted that whoever truly wants the reunification, peace and prosperity of the country should thoroughly implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, united close in the noble idea of By Our Nation Itself.

articles.title: Foundation Day of Korea Marked
articles.content:
Foundation Day of Korea Marked
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- An event took place at the Mausoleum of King Tangun in Kangdong County, Pyongyang, on Saturday to mark the Foundation Day of Korea (October 3, the birth anniversary of King Tangun).
					 Tangun is the ancestral father of the Korean nation, who built Ancient Korea (early 30th century B.C.-108 B.C.), the first state in the East, with Pyongyang as its capital.
					
					 In the past the history of Ancient Korea was distorted by flunkeys and Japanese reptile historians and Tangun had been regarded as a mythical being.
					
					 However, King Tangun was ascertained on a scientific basis to be a real being born more than 5,000 years ago, thanks to the energetic guidance of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 When his remains were discovered in Kangdong County in Juche 82 (1993), Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il made sure that his mausoleum was built into a magnificent one as befitting that of the homogenous Korean nation's ancestral father. They organized the King Tangun's Mausoleum Reconstruction Committee and energetically guided the reconstruction of the mausoleum.
					
					 As a result, the mausoleum covering a total area of 45 hectares was reconstructed as a national treasure and a precious cultural wealth in less than one year.
					
					 Since then, the Korean people have gathered at the mausoleum every year to hold an event celebrating the Foundation Day of Korea, wishing that the reunification of Korea, their cherished desire, would be realized at an early date.

articles.title: Art Contest among Primary Organizations of Trade Unions Held
articles.content:
Art Contest among Primary Organizations of Trade Unions Held
 Anju, October 3 (KCNA) -- An art contest among primary organizations of the trade unions across the country was held at the Namhung Youth Chemical Complex from Oct. 1 to 3 to celebrate the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 It brought together members of primary committees and organizations of trade unions of different units.
					
					 In their diverse numbers its participants fully displayed their music talents they have cultivated through mass cultural and art activities.
					
					 During the contest they conducted various activities including meetings for congratulating innovators and agitation for increased production to encourage the officials and workers of the complex in their drive for boosting fertilizer production.
					
					 There also took place a mass musical instruments exhibition.

articles.title: Poster of Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Exhibition Produced
articles.content:
Poster of Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Exhibition Produced
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- A poster of the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Exhibition for celebrating the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) to be held in Pyongyang was produced.
					 Engraved on it is a slogan of "Long Live the Workers' Party of Korea, the Organizer and Guide of All Victories of the Korean People!"  Written on its upper part are letters "70th Anniversary of Party Founding" and "Celebration".
					
					 Described in its center are the emblem of the WPK against the background of fireworks and flowers of the sun in full bloom.
					
					 Seen in its lower part are letters bearing "Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Exhibition" and the venue and period of the exhibition.

articles.title: Full-length Novel "Dignity" Published in DPRK
articles.content:
Full-length Novel "Dignity" Published in DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- The full-length novel "Dignity" written by Pak Thae Su was published by the April 15 Literary Production Centre with the approach of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK). It is part of the cycle of novels "Immortal History."
					 The novel impressively tells about the exploits President Kim Il Sung performed by decisively shattering the moves of the U.S. imperialists to stifle the DPRK and protect the sovereignty and dignity of Juche Korea. 
					
					 In January, Juche 57 (1968) seamen of the Korean People's Army (KPA) captured the U.S. spy ship Pueblo which intruded into the territorial waters of the DPRK. The novel takes this period as its setting.
					
					 The novel recalls the U.S. imperialists threatened to ignite a total war unless the DPRK sends back the spy ship and its crewmen, making absurd pretexts in the wake of the capture of the ship. 
					
					 The President clarifies the stand of the WPK, the KPA and the DPRK government to react to the U.S. "retaliation" with stronger counteraction and to the total war with all-out war and powerfully aroused all the service personnel and people to the decisive struggle to protect the dignity of the country, the novel notes. 
					
					 It makes profound and truthful representation of the historical facts that while leading the confrontation without gunfire to victory, the President equipped all the people with a Juche-oriented view on a war, guided military and foreign affairs with his iron-willed courage and guts, brilliant strategy and leadership art and steadily pushed ahead with the work for improving the people's living standard and economic construction. 
					
					 The novel impressively tells about the great personality of leader Kim Jong Il guiding the service personnel and people to one victory after another.

articles.title: Kamapho Fishery Station in DPRK
articles.content:
Kamapho Fishery Station in DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- The Kamapho Fishery Station in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea has recently succeeded in habituating tilapia to seawater.
					 The station is a small unit located in the country's west coast, but it is well-known for signal progress in fishery production.
					
					 According to its manager Kim Song Chol, the station with favorable conditions for offshore fish farming formed a group of small-scale fishing ships and built 14 hectares of shellfish breeding grounds in a recent few years, under the Workers' Party of Korea's fishing policy.
					
					 Now, it has more than 1,000 hectares of breeding grounds and turns out a large quantity of marine products while further improving its fishing ships and equipment.
					
					 The station was established in April Juche 50 (1961) on President Kim Il Sung's instruction for conducting the offshore fish farming on a large scale.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il visited it on September 15, 1968, stressing the need to build offshore breeding grounds better, protect and propagate marine resources and strengthen fishery.

articles.title: DPRK Scholar on North-South Joint Declarations
articles.content:
DPRK Scholar on North-South Joint Declarations
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- It has been eight years since the adoption of the historic October 4 Declaration between the north and the south of Korea.
					 In this regard, Prof. and Dr. Jon Ha Chol, director of the DPRK Academy of Social Sciences, said that the October 4 Declaration is a great reunification program and a patriotic banner common to the Korean nation as it opened a broad avenue for accelerating the national reunification while deepening the reconciliation, unity and cooperation among all the fellow countrymen under the banner of the June 15 Joint Declaration.
					
					 He further said:
					
					 The joint declarations are a precious legacy for the Korean nation left by leader Kim Jong Il to implement President Kim Il Sung's last instruction for national reunification.
					
					 To whether respect and implement the north-south joint declarations or not is a touchstone distinguishing reunification from division and patriotism from treachery.
					
					 The history and reality clearly show that the United States does never allow the improved relations between the north and the south of Korea and its reunification as the very one responsible for its division.
					
					 The U.S. has persistently instigated the south Korean regime to bedevil the north-south relations while escalating the tensions on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 It is crying for "complete preparedness" against any possible "provocation" after a joint press release was issued as a result of the recent north-south high-level urgent contact.
					
					 The facts go to prove that the U.S. is seeking to victimize the Korean Peninsula and all Koreans for its strategy of world domination.
					
					 Hence, the north and the south of Korea should take concerted action against the outsiders' interference and aggression moves so as to ensure the improvement of their relations.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities truly want the improved relations between the north and the south, they should not seek the confrontation in social systems but work for great national unity in the idea of By Our Nation Itself.
					
					 And they should respect and thoroughly implement the Three Principles of National Reunification and the north-south joint declarations in keeping with the desire and demand of all their fellow countrymen.
					
					 All Koreans will surely realize the historic cause of national reunification under the uplifted banner of independence, defending peace and security of the nation from the U.S. obstruction moves.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Slammed for Begging for International Cooperation in Campaign against DPRK
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Slammed for Begging for International Cooperation in Campaign against DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- The south Korean authorities are making desperate efforts to boost cooperation in international pressure upon the DPRK while vociferating about "the north's provocation".
					 The "meeting of foreign ministers" of the U.S., Japan and south Korea held in New York recently was a criminal confab to label the DPRK a "provocateur" and justify their cooperation in pressurizing it.
					
					 It was reported that the above-said meeting discussed "package cooperation proposals" for "deterring provocation" while terming the DPRK's exercise of independent right "violation of resolution" and "provocation" and crying out for tightening "sanctions".
					
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Saturday says:
					
					 The south Korean authorities are trumpeting about "the north's provocation" together with outside forces for aggression, hypocrisy to mislead public opinion at home and abroad.
					
					 Obstacles and difficulties are still lying in the way of mending the north-south relations and national reconciliation and unity have not been achieved due to such stupid guys keen on escalating confrontation with the compatriots in the north, backed by foreign forces.
					
					 The south Korean authorities are seriously mistaken if they calculate they can infringe upon the sovereignty of the DPRK and attain their criminal aim in league with foreign forces. This is as foolish an act as pricking one's own eyes.
					
					 They would be well advised to control their tongues, bearing in mind that their persistent floating of the story about "the north's provocation" would only more saliently reveal their ugly colors as provocateurs and be unable to escape a stern judgment of history.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Bad Habit of Confrontation Will Invite Only War and Self-Ruin: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Bad Habit of Confrontation Will Invite Only War and Self-Ruin: KCNA Commentary
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- The chief executive of south Korea is busying herself with the moves to bring the situation on the Korean Peninsula now on the track of detente back to the one of confrontation and conflict.
					 In her "keynote address" made at the 70th session of the UN General Assembly, she let loose a string of such invectives that the "north's dismantlement of its nuclear weapons is a top priority task for building a world without nuclear weapons" and the "north should make efforts to have its inhabitants overcome difficulties through reform and opening, rather than additional provocation." Not content with hurting the dignity and social system of the DPRK while talking about "improvement of human rights," she openly revealed her ambition for realizing "unification through absorption" with the backing of foreign forces under the pretext of "peaceful unification."
					
					 This is an unpardonable provocation against the DPRK and a heinous confrontation racket chilling the hard-won atmosphere of improving the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 The situation on the Korean Peninsula requires responsible politicians to say and act to be helpful to the stable trend of the situation in the spirit of the north-south agreement.
					
					 The DPRK is making all efforts to prevent armed conflict and rev up the atmosphere of peace, stability, reconciliation and cooperation as agreed upon at the north-south high-level urgent contact.
					
					 However, the south Korean authorities have not discarded bad habit of confrontation but committed ceaseless hostile acts such as anti-DPRK "human rights" racket and leaflet scattering since the north and the south reached the agreement.
					
					 The invectives let loose by the present chief executive at the UN arena marked the height of vicious provocations made by the south Korean authorities irritating and denying the dialogue partner. 
						
						 As far as the DPRK's war deterrent for self-defense, political system and human rights touted by her are concerned, they are the core issues it has consistently and firmly upheld for the sovereignty of the country, the dignity of the nation, prosperity and happiness of all generations to come.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and their followers' demand that the DPRK abandon these issues is little short of pressurizing the DPRK to appear before them with bare hand and become their slaves.
					
					 The south Korean chief executive did not hesitate to make such provocative remarks throwing a wet blanket over the efforts of all Koreans for the improvement of inter-Korean relations and peace and prosperity on the Korean Peninsula. This makes one draw a conclusion that she is bereft of even elementary political sense and capacity to judge things.
					
					 The reckless confrontation racket of the south Korean authorities has put not only the inter-Korean relations but the reunion of separated families and relatives being pushed forward with much effort at peril.
					
					 The DPRK has no idea of showing leniency to those who are persistently pursuing confrontation in disregard of its magnanimity to achieve reconciliation.
					
					 The south Korean authorities would be well advised to act with discretion, bearing in mind that their persistent confrontation racket against the compatriots is as foolish an act as becoming themselves targets of striking force of the Korean People's Army.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Highly Praised by Swiss Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Highly Praised by Swiss Organizations
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea released a joint statement on September 27 on the occasion of the 18th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The statement said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il was elected general secretary of the WPK on October 8, 1997.
					
					 He was heir to President Kim Il Sung and great successor to the revolutionary cause of Juche and Songun.
					
					 Under his leadership the DPRK was developed into a space power and a nuclear weapons state.
					
					 He provided two north-south summits which resulted in the adoption of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration, a programme for implementing it.
					
					 Under his Songun revolutionary leadership the DPRK turned into a political and ideological power and military power.
					
					 After his sudden demise, he was elected eternal general secretary of the WPK at its fourth conference by the unanimous wishes of the party, army and people.
					
					 This was an expression of the Korean people's absolute reverence for him.

articles.title: Seminars for Celebrating Birthday of WPK Held in India, Poland
articles.content:
Seminars for Celebrating Birthday of WPK Held in India, Poland
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- Seminars were held in India and Poland on September 27 and 28 on the occasion of the 70th anniversary of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Displayed at the venues of the seminars were photos dealing with exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 On display there were their works, and publications introducing the DPRK making a long drive under the guidance of the WPK.
					
					 Vipin Gupta, chairman of the Juche Philosophy Study Committee of India, said in a speech that the WPK makes it an iron rule to solve all problems, always placing the requirements and interests of the people above anything else.
					
					 The WPK enjoys absolute support of the people as it has served them faithfully. 
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the WPK, is devoting his all to the people, carrying forward the will of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Speakers including Jacech Poniewierski, first vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Poland-Korea Association, praised the President and Kim Jong Il for accomplishing the cause of founding the revolutionary party and developing the WPK into an invincible and steel-strong party and a mother party which is deeply rooted among the popular masses and which formed a harmonious whole with them.

articles.title: October 4 Declaration Praised by Swiss Organizations
articles.content:
October 4 Declaration Praised by Swiss Organizations
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- The October 4 declaration is a programme for implementing the June 15 joint declaration adopted in 2000.
					 The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea said this in a joint statement on September 26.
					
					 A north-south summit was held in Pyongyang eight years ago thanks to leader Kim Jong Il and the October 4 declaration for the improvement of the inter-Korean relations and peace and prosperity on the Korean Peninsula was adopted, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 As Kim Jong Il wisely led the struggle for implementing the Three Charters for National Reunification advanced by President Kim Il Sung, the above-said historic declarations were adopted between the north and the south.
					
					 Although the pro-US conservative "government" of south Korea is putting the hard-won north-south relations at peril under the patronage of the U.S., it cannot stem the trend of the era of reunification guided by the spirit of By Our Nation Itself which started and made progress thanks to the above-said declarations.
					
					 No force can block the way of the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea.

articles.title: U.S. Hostile Policy toward DPRK Denounced by UK Figure
articles.content:
U.S. Hostile Policy toward DPRK Denounced by UK Figures
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- The Confederation against War comprising figures of different political parties and organizations and members of the Parliament in UK held an annual meeting on September 19 denouncing the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					 It adopted a resolution titled "No U.S. and its allies' interference and aggression on the Korean Peninsula" urging the U.S. to conclude a peace treaty with the DPRK.
					
					 The resolution said that we are opposed to the anti-DPRK hostile acts being conducted by the U.S. and its followers on the Korean Peninsula and in its vicinity. 
					
					 It went on:
					
					 For over six decades the U.S. has enforced the criminal policy of economic blockade against the DPRK and perpetrated ceaseless provocations, deploying huge troops and nuclear weapons in south Korea.
					
					 The U.S. staged large-scale war exercises for aggression including Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises with the south Korean authorities every year.
					
					 The signboard of UN is being abused for these war exercises without any approval of the UN.
					
					 The Confederation against War has drawn a conclusion that the danger of war on the Korean Peninsula is caused by the obstruction, interference and the aggressive policy pursued by the U.S., UK and their followers, and strongly opposes them.
					
					 It urges the U.S. to conclude a peace treaty with the DPRK.
					
					 No country should be exposed to the threat of a war regardless of differing political system.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam envia mensaje de felicitacion a Joachim Gauck
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam envia mensaje de felicitacion a Joachim Gauck
Pyongyang, 3 de octubre (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 3 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de la Republica Federal de Alemania, Joachim Gauck, en ocasion del dia nacional de ese pais europeo.
					Convencido de que las relaciones entre los dos paises se desarrollaran favorablemente conforme a los intereses de los pueblos de los dos paises, el remitente desea al destinatario exitos en su trabajo responsable.

articles.title: Jefe de delegacion coreana demanda sustitucion de acuerdo de armisticio por  convenio de paz
articles.content:
Jefe de delegacion coreana demanda sustitucion de acuerdo de armisticio por  convenio de paz
Pyongyang, 3 de octubre (ACNC) -- El ministro de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Ri Su Yong pronuncio el dia primero un discurso en el 70o periodo de sesiones de la Asamblea General de la ONU. 
					El canciller dijo que es importante sacar la experiencia en los exitos alcanzados en las actividades de la ONU y buscar la leccion en los fracasos y continuo:
					
					Durante 70 anos pasados el mundo y la humanidad no se hallan en paz ni un momento. 
					
					En el siglo 21 tambien el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU sigue cometiendo las arbitrariedades anti-RPDC despreciando la justicia y la ley internacional.
					
					La ley internacional estipula que el uso de espacio cosmico es el derecho independiente de un Estado. Y mas de 10 paises lanzaron los satelites artificiales.
					
					Pero, el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU fabrico la "resolucion" ilicita que prohibe solo el lanzamiento de satelite de la RPDC. 
					
					E invento la otra "resolucion" que impide solo la prueba nuclear de la RPDC, aunque ya 9 paises desarrollaron las armas nucleares y realizaron mas de 2 mil pruebas nucleares en total. 
					
					El desarrollo de cosmos con fines pacificos es el derecho independiente de un Estado soberano en virtud de la ley internacional y una medida de autodefensa frente a la politica hostil y la amenaza nuclear de EE.UU. 
					
					El gobierno de la RPDC tiene la firme decision de defender la dignidad nacional respondiendo con las intransigentes medidas de autodefensa a las acciones injustas que cuestionan el lanzamiento de satelite con fines pacificos. 
					
					En agosto pasado, en la Peninsula Coreana ocurrio un grave incidente a punto de estallar una guerra enfocando la atencion de todo el mundo incluso el Nordeste Asiatico. 
					
					Hoy dia, la sustitucion del acuerdo de armisticio por el convenio de paz se presenta como un asunto impostergable. 
					
					Si EE.UU. lo consiente, el gobierno de la RPDC tiene la voluntad de hacer el dialogo constructivo para prevenir la guerra y choques en la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					En el caso de que EE.UU. cambie con audacia su politica, el ambiente de seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana acogera la nueva coyuntura de mejoramiento y se eliminaran las preocupaciones de EE.UU. por la seguridad. 
					
					Esto es la optima opcion y remedio que exponemos en esta plataforma de la ONU que recuerda sus 70 anos transcurridos y preve el porvenir a seguir. 
					
					La RPDC tiene la conviccion de que sustituir lo mas pronto posible el acuerdo de armisticio por el convenio de paz es la via para garantizar la paz y seguridad internacionales en la Peninsula Coreana y arreglar las relaciones anormales entre la RPDC y la ONU.

articles.title: Efectuado acto por dia de Fundacion de Corea
articles.content:
Efectuado acto por dia de Fundacion de Corea
Pyongyang, 3 de octubre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar este sabado ante el Mausoleo de Tangun (fundador de Corea) el acto por el Dia de la Fundacion de Corea.
					A la ocasion asistieron Kim Yong Dae, presidente del Comite Central del Partido Social-Democrata de Corea y del Consejo por la Reconciliacion Nacional, Kim Wan Su, director del Secretariado del Comite Central del Frente Democratico para la Reunificacion de la Patria (FDRP) y presidente del Comite Norteno para la Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio, Choe Jin Su, presidente de la direccion nortena de la Alianza Pannacional por la Reunificacion de la Patria y miembro de la Presidencia del Comite Central del FDRP, Ri Kil Song, miembro de la Presidencia del CC del FDRP, funcionarios del Consejo por la Reunificacion de la Nacion de Tangun, funcionarios de rama correspondiente, trabajadores capitalinos y compatriotas en ultramar.
					
					Ante todo, tuvo lugar la ceremonia en recordacion de Tangun.
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Yun Jong Ho, vicepresidente del Consejo por la Reunificacion de la Nacion de Tangun.
					
					El informante se refirio a que los grandes lideres Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il hicieron buscar y brillar al fundador de la nacion coreana y la historia nacional de 5 milenios.
					
					Alabo la grandeza del Mariscal Kim Jong Un quien apoya y defiende las proezas de los grandes lideres y glorifica mas la historia y la tradicion de la nacion coreana.
					
					Quienes desean de veras la reunificacion, la paz y la prosperidad del pais, deben ejecutar cabalmente la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre unidos firmemente bajo el noble ideal de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales", asevero.

articles.title: Vicios conflictivos traeran solo guerra y autodestruccion, insiste ACNC
articles.content:
Vicios conflictivos traeran solo guerra y autodestruccion, insiste ACNC
Pyongyang, 3 de octubre (ACNC) -- La mandataria surcoreana se desespera para devolver a la confrontacion y el conflicto la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana cambiada con rumbo a la coyuntura de alivio.
					En su "discurso de base" pronunciado en el 70o periodo de sesiones de la Asamblea General de la ONU, ella maldijo que el "arma nuclear del Norte de Corea es una tarea a ser solucionada primero para construir un mundo sin armas nucleares" y "el Norte debe esforzarse no por la provocacion adicional, sino por la reforma y la apertura para liberar a los habitantes de las dificultades".
					
					Y calumnio la dignidad y el regimen de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hablando de la "mejora de derechos humanos" y expuso abiertamente la ambicion para realizar la "unificacion mediante la absorbicion de regimenes" bajo el amparo de las fuerzas exteriores.
					
					Esto es la locura conflictiva que lleva al fracaso el ambiente de la mejora de relaciones Norte-Sur preparado a duras penas.
					
					Actualmente la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana demanda, mas que nunca, a los politicos responsables a hablar y actuar a base del espiritu del acuerdo N-S de modo que den ayuda a controlar establemente la corriente de la situacion.
					
					Conforme al acuerdo del contacto urgente de alto nivel Norte-Sur, la RPDC hace todos los esfuerzos para impedir el choque armado y fomentar el ambiente de la paz, la estabilidad, la reconciliacion y la cooperacion.
					
					Sin embargo, aun despues de concertado el acuerdo N-S, las autoridades surcoreanas no abandonaron los vicios conflictivos y perpetraron sin cesar los actos hostiles tales como la campana de "DDHH" anti-RPDC y el lanzamiento de volantes.
					
					Los viles actos provocativos de las autoridades surcoreanas llegan al climax por los disparates lanzados en la ONU por la mandataria surcoreana.
					
					En cuanto al disuasivo autodefensivo de guerra, el regimen politico y los derechos humanos de la RPDC censurados tanto por la mandataria surcoreana, todos son los puntos claves que la RPDC mantiene firmemente para la soberania del pais, la dignidad de la nacion y la prosperidad y felicidad de las generaciones venideras.
					
					Exigirnos a abandonarlos es precisamente exigirnos a ponerse con las manos vacias ante los imperialistas norteamericanos y sus satelites y al final, convertirse en sus esclavos.
					
					Cuando toda la nacion se esfuerza por la mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas y por la paz y la prosperidad de la Peninsula Coreana, la mandataria surcoreana solto sin vacilacion disparates provocativos, lo cual muestra que ella no tiene la basica sensibilidad politica y la capacidad de juzgar la realidad.
					
					Debido a las imprudentes maniobras conflictivas de las autoridades surcoreanas, ahora estan en estado peligrosisimo las relaciones intercoreanas y tambien el encuentro de familiares y parientes separados.
					
					Nosotros no tenemos ganas de prestar la magnanimidad al rival que nos arremete rechazando nuestra generosidad de reconciliacion.
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas deben actuar con prudencia al tener presente que cuanto mas recurran a la confrontacion fratricida, mas seran los blancos de nuestras fuerzas armadas.
					
					Los vicios conflictivos traeran solo la guerra y la autodestruccion.
